website_summaries.verdict: The light weight and easy, no-mess clean-up are the standout features of this vacuum that is built to last.
pros: For those who have difficulty pushing heavier vacuums around their home, this lightweight model can be the answer
The canister detaches with a push of a button, so emptying is a breeze
Some users report no noticeable drop off in suction after several years of regular use
cons: The short cord on this model can make it less than ideal for larger rooms

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy purchase..
customer_reviews.text: Not a good purchase.We planned to buy a small space saving but good Vacuum cleaner and we decided to purchase this one.It's nice looking, small saves space, you can adjust the height . Its easy to dump the dirt and clean the filter. But after a few days it stopped cleaning properly which is the main work of a vacuum cleaner.For cleaning a carpet floor you have to use it more than 1 time.Later the bottom roller stopped working also.So we ended up buying an expensive but good one and we are happy with our decision now.
customer_reviews.author: SMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: This relatively inexpensive vacuum cleaner is quite good! I bought it because it is light and easy to handle and was pleasantly surprised by how much dirt and dust it picks up. I especially like it because I can just take it out real fast and tidy up the house without much effort at all. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not that Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 years ago and its still working....although not that great. According to my Son, he said "It's Crappy". This vacuum was not working at all when I last used it yesterday. It took many sweeps just to vacuum a small live in camper floor...it was not picking anything up...and its spitting a lot of dust back out. Our other Dirt Devil is not that great either..same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up my horrible Christmas tree mess whiz-bang
customer_reviews.text: This is after one use, but I'm so glad I bought this. Put up my Christmas tree and the hard wood / rugs were covered in forest dandruff. My old vacuum cleaner would not have been able to pick any of it up; this sucked up those tree flakes perfectly. It was a pretty severe first trial and it beasted all tests. Easy to empty / clean. Cord was long enough that I didn't wind up needing to use an extension cord, but that's just me and my house. If I had bigger rooms I could see that being annoying, but it'd be fine with a 10 ft extension or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: troublef

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for light cleaning and a tight budget.
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a light weight and inexpensive vacuum, this is seriously worth looking into. The canister is easy to clean and the suction is adequate for everything but the most heavy duty cleaning. The construction is adequate, but feels a bit on the fragile side. This certainly isn't made for heavy duty use, but if you have a small apartment or office and need an inexpensive bagless vacuum for areas that aren't high traffic, this should do the trick. More attachments and a longer hose would be nice, but for the price, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum, short extension tool
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Have to empty the canister a lot since I have pets (So. Much. Hair.) but it gets the job done with no dust. Doesn't jam and my lon hair doesn't get stuck in the works like other vacuums. Small footprint so it fits easily in my front closet. Knocking off one star because the extender arm is ridiculously short so I have to lay the vacuum on its side to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Young

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome super powerful monster of a vacuum! At a great price too!
customer_reviews.text: Did you know that the dust, allergens, and particles in your house can be just as toxic as outside? It could be making you sick if you don't have a good vacuum! I've had my DirtDevil vacuum for about two weeks now and let me say it's a monster! I couldn't believe I only paid $50 for this on Amazon! It's loud, powerful and compact. The "cyclonic" action is pretty cool. It moves the captured dust around like a tornado. The added HEPA filter is nice too. No need to spend several hundred dollars on a quality vacuum when this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LGBTAreEQUAL

customer_reviews.title: Drastically reduced dust in my apartment
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a small, powerful, HEPA filtered, bagless, upright vacuum. This Dynamite II hits all those requirements and then some. The detachable suction cord is very useful for removing dust from window sills, electronics etc. I am really happy with it as I live in a small apartment and only need to move the electric cord once to cover the whole place. The only area that I wish it did a better job with is on hardwood/bare floors. Sometimes it takes a few passes to get all the little pieces of debris. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I think the vacuum is basically a good vacuum. There are a couple of areas where if could be improved. The first one if the on/off switch. It could be up on the handle . The other one is the area where you push to release the handle so it can move. Stepping on it is difficult with people who have sensitive feet. I am one of them. I have used Dirt Devil vacuums before and basically they are good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: This Vacuum Sucks! (In a good way)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, of all the vacuums I have used this one is effective, easy to empty and clean and very small, compact, and portable. The only things I don't like is that it does not come with many attachments for the the hose (not a necessity) and the red paint scuffs kind of easily, but my roommates tend to be slightly careless so that might not be all the vacuums fault. I highly recommend this product it is inexpensive and gets the job done well!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Worst vacuum ever, so disappointed my last Dirt Devil was excellent but this one picks up nothing not even sand. I will vacuum twice and then have to go over it with a broom and I get a ton of dirt that the vacuum misses. I do NOT recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Judy & Ken Danczyk

customer_reviews.title: loud and compact
customer_reviews.text: Good product which is compact and easy to move around and store, but it sounds like a jet engine blowing up. It does a good job of vacuuming and I like the washable filter, but if there are sleeping people anywhere in the house, forget it. The hose is very short also and does not stretch very much, so it is clumsy on this aspect. For the price, it was ok, but check the big box stores as it sells about the same if not cheaper there.
customer_reviews.author: HiTemp

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, amazing how much dust it picks up from what I though was a clean carpet. I wonder if its too strong and pulling fibers off my old carpet, only time will tell if my carpet starts going bald. When I am done cleaning, I can't stand to see the dust inside. So I clean it each time I use it. But I only use it once a week. Well worth the money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mokopuku

customer_reviews.title: Used this vacuum only a handful of times over a period of 1 year before this it was completely useless. No matter how empty the
customer_reviews.text: Only have hardwood floor w/ area rugs in my apartment and use mostly a broom. Used this vacuum only a handful of times over a period of 1 year before this it was completely useless. No matter how empty the container was, and no matter how clean the brushes and cylinder were, it didn't pick up anything anymore. Worked great at first, but not even worth the money that I did spend on it for the number of times that it was used.
customer_reviews.author: JNH

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: If I had seen this vacuum in the store, I would have passed it by. When I took it out of the box, I was quite disappointed, but then I gave it a chance. It is perfect for me! It is light enough that I can carry it upstairs and what sold me was the canister. I am embarrassed to say that it was full in no time. I had no idea my house was so dirty! It is pretty noisy and the cord isn't vey long, but the positives outweigh those two things. I will recommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: kindleconvert

customer_reviews.title: Decent Vac for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this Vac for my sister-in-law, not a young woman. She put it together herself, easy, and light weight. When I used it I found it was indeed very powerful and picked up lots of cat fur that other machines had left behind. We had recently had the carpets professionaly cleaned. My only qualm is that the brush level is not adjustable. If you have deep pile carpeting you would have problems with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This vacuum stopped working after one month of normal use. I couldn't get a refund for it either, since it was 2 days past the window of return. I checked for any obstruction, took the vacuum cleaner apart, removed small pieces of debris from bottom tube, but it never had suction again. T
customer_reviews.author: xochy

customer_reviews.title: The "Suck It Up" Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: I was quite impressed with the suction power on this fan! Its very light (which is great b/c I'm quite petite and prefer not to alligator wrestle a vacuum to clean) and easy to store in my little apartment. Plenty of attachments to get into the nooks and crannies such as under the over (grr those cooking crumbs) and works lovely even on the hardwood floors! Love that it's bagless too!!! Less one star b/c it is probably the loudest vacuum I've ever owned and the air on it blows straight up so I feel like if I lean over I'm inhaling debris which bothers me. BUT over all a GREAT vacuum for the price!! :) Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Magness

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself! 3 months old and this vacuum cannot keep up with one person, small house, no pets. Vacuum once a week. I have had good dirt devil vacuums in the past and this is NOT one of them!!! Today I used the attachment for 8-10 minutes and then vacuumed a small bedroom when it popped at me! Not to mention I've hated this thing since it arrived, because it is not a heavy enough unit for carpet, and it does not maintain enough suction to even pick up small crumbs on laminate floors. All in all, I do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MN Woman

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it: great price, great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST cheap vacuum I have ever encountered. I had an upright Shark stick vacuum before, and it did not even compare to this Dirt Devil. This vacuum has intense sucking power, and is easy to empty. I use it on a few area rugs and it does a wonderful job- shockingly, it picks everything up! Hair, dirt, fuzz, pet hair, etc. (unlike the crappy Shark stick vacuum). Also, it is light. ONLY downfall, if you can even consider it to be one, since it is a vacuum, after all, is that it is a BIT loud- scares the kitty quite a bit ;) Overall- IT WORKS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Limited practicality
customer_reviews.text: It seems to lose suction very quickly. It is easy to empty the container, a lot less messy than my last vacuum. There are only 2 tools, and no extension, so the reach is limited. It is VERY narrow. This makes a lot more work for whomever is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One mighty little machine
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight but powerful. The handle pulls down to floor level, so you can slide the vacuum under furniture. Disposal of vacuumed contents is simple. It's not very wide at the business end, so I wouldn't recommend it for whole-house cleaning with a lot of carpeting. Great for quick touch ups between the maid's visits, or would be perfect for an apartment or dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lightweight, sturdy Great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Great product for carpet, good attachments, very lightweight easy to assemble and use. Cord is a good length and everything packs up nicely. Not great on hardwood, does a decent job, but not the best suction. Needs a better seal to the floor. Still does a pretty good job. Noisy yes, but not extremely. The big fan does tend to blow some dust around, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job 100%. But you must clean ALL filters frequently(Not just empty the tank) or it won't . Given the price, it is a good bargain
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: This is far and away the worst I have encountered ever
customer_reviews.text: I am 69 years old and have purchased and used many inexpensive vacuum cleaners. This is far and away the worst I have encountered ever. I have had Dirt Devils in the past and they were okay. Suction is poor, the tools are pathetic and pretty much useless. Tried it on laminate and carpet both, same results. Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks! In a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my 3 year old Eureka had lost suction and was leaving dirt behind, and I am absolutely amazed at the difference. I have 2 short haired cats and had been vacuuming regularly with the old vacuum, and I still had to clean the bin 2x/room when I first brought the Dirt Devil home - it cleaned with untold fury! I don't know what the durability of this item is like - for the price and being a pet owner I don't expect much - but if I can get a couple year's performance at this level I'll be thrilled, out of the box it's a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Cleans as well as much more expensive Vacuums
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using this vacuum everyday for going on a month and it seems to work great. When our $400 Kenmore started spitting sparks and then died we needed a quick inexpensive substitute unless we got it repaired or replaced. However it is working so well we will keep using it until it conks out. Hard to tell how long it will last since it only cost $70 but we will find out. My wife really loves that it is so light and easy to move around. Could use a longer cord but with an extension cord that problem is easily solved.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Worked poorly
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a green Dirt Devil that she used for years and liked (model unknown). When it died I bought this. She is less than impressed. She put it in the basement for light duty and bought another brand. This was a cheap vacuum but so was the old green one that she had. Good luck finding a cheap vacuum that works good. This is not it.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaMan

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT & POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a vaccuum? It works, really well, has a nice removable compartment so no waste on bags, and the filter is even easy to clean, dry or wet. Price is right, from a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Moss

customer_reviews.title: It Should Have Been Better
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dirt Devil Extreme Quick Vac hoping that it would measure up to my broken old Hoover bagless I had used for 10 years. I was not impressed with the results. It didn't vacuum as well as the old Hoover and was more difficult to push around. It was easier to empty and did an OK job, but I wish that I had spent a little more and gotten another Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't need to ACTUALLY vaccum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has some of the worst suction, on a vacuum, that I have ever encountered. It took me 20 minutes to get some of the dog hair off of an 8' by 10' area rug, and it still looked terrible. I really wanted to like it, as our Dirt Devil Breeze bagless was one of the best, inexpensive vacuums I have ever owned. This one was a waste of $60.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don't tell my wife.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. So much better than my big old heavy vacuum. I'm actually surprised every time I use it on our oriental rugs. It's hard to believe how well it picks up. Was all of that dirt and dust really on the rugs? Huh, guess the floor did need vacuuming. Don't tell my wife.
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Butler

customer_reviews.title: vac for home
customer_reviews.text: it was smaller than i thought it would be but gets the job done very well i should have noticed when it said quick vac it meant a small vac for quick pick ups not intended for whole house at one time. but yes i would recommend this vac to anyone looking for something small to use.
customer_reviews.author: tkeels

customer_reviews.title: Good, wish it could be more flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product - excellent on carpets and parquet. The only thing I wish this product had is more flexibility on the front, as some times it's hard to reach corners or narrow passages. Otherwise, I recommend it, considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cosimo Cecchi

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dirt devil. I did not think it would be strong enough to pick up pet hair but it is. Its light and very powerful. The canister is easy to remove and empty unlike the shark. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: shamrock

customer_reviews.title: This is better than dyson dc24
customer_reviews.text: This is better than dyson dc24. I use this and a dyson dc24 on a weekly basis and I much prefer the dirt devil. Sucking power is much better, and the vacuum is much simpler. Would buy again and again and again!
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight medium-duty machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is lightweight, easy to assemble, easy to figure out, easy to clean, easy to change out parts, and has adequate power for medium-duty cleaning. No need to change out bags or filter. For the price, you won't find anything much better.
customer_reviews.author: Hot in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good product I really like Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: Good product I really like Dirt Devil, but this product is unusually noisy, but for the price a little noise is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum was recommended by my sister
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was recommended by my sister. She has well as her two daughters all have this model and I heard nothing but raves about this machine. I have permanently retired my extremely expensive Kirby (so very heavy and hard for me to handle) now that I have the Dirt Devil Extreme. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It is very light to push and easy to empty but.... It is not very wide so it takes a long time to vacuum a room. It does not have strong sucking power so you have to go over an area multiple times to pick up loose particles. It is terrible on tile partly due to the lack of floor height adjustment and the cord is relatively short as well. If you need to vacuum a multi-surface space and like your carpets free of debris, this is not the vacuum for you. Better to pay the extra money and get a higher quality vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kokx-Templet

customer_reviews.title: Our Little Worker
customer_reviews.text: Own a Kirby with all the extras but needed something for quick clean-ups. This little guy does the job. With two dogs and a cat tracking in dirt constantly, we can whip this vacumn out and the mess is gone in a jiffy. This is not the do all vac the Kirby is, but for small quick jobs - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LadyTricia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with how much dirt this vacuum picks up from a rug. Emptying is easy, cleaning the foam HEPA pre-filter is easy. It's loud--but then, most vacuums are loud. I keep a set of headphone-type silencers in my cleaning closet anyway. For the price, I think this is an excellent vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: SDW

customer_reviews.title: Three Years and Still Going
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth year of using the vacuum cleaner, and I am surprised that it has lived for so long. It's great for a 500ft2 space, using it about twice a month. Still sucks well.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Curtis

customer_reviews.title: and could get up to like 80 dB
customer_reviews.text: Okay what to say about this dirt devil extreme cyclone this thing is very noisy the wheel that is throwing up the dust or the particles into the container is very loud .and could get up to like 80 dB.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harper

customer_reviews.title: Strong little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased. It's very lightweight, and powerful. I use it for only 1 room, and it picked up SOOOO much dirt. It's crazy how much dust a little room can accumulate.
customer_reviews.author: C Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wish the hose was a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price. Powerful and cleans pet hair off furniture well. The hose is a bit short and when I tug it brings the vacuum down to the ground. I've more than once smacked myself in the face trying to vacuum harder to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: well it sucks alright..
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is lightweight and has powerful suction. It is easy to empty. The reason why i am giving it a three is because the hose is way too short... so short that whenever I use it, the body of the vacuum tips over (because it is so light). It is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dirt Devil. It's lightweight and I carry it up and down the stairway without any problems. It's suction is very powerful and works alot better than other large name brand vacuums. It is very loud, but it gets the job done. I use it for every room in the house. I especially love it because you can use it on any type of floor -- carpet as well as hardwood or tiled floors. You do not have to remove or add any attachments to go from carpet to hardwood to vacuum. It's a one stop shop floor cleaner. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap, tiny piece of crap. It is almost a toy vacuum. It barely sucks up anything, even on a low carpet. I do not recommend this product to anyone. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this vacuum I bought one at target 3 years ago for $34.99and it still works better then this one?? I thought I was up grading it's already been in the shop once!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bonner

customer_reviews.title: sooo loud for a tiny vaccuum and it does not clean well
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to push this vacuum around, it doesn't glide the way that vacuums should so I end up tugging and pushing on it a lot but it seems to clean well. it is very compact and takes up a small space. **revision**after having it for a while now, this is the loudest vaccuum I have ever had. It is almost an ear piercing nose. I will wear ear plugs from now on. I do not recommend this item at all! It does not even clean up that well for all the noise it makes!
customer_reviews.author: tree sitter

customer_reviews.title: good deal!!
customer_reviews.text: This little upright is super strong you hear it as soon as you turn it on joke.. This vacuum is basic so if you just bought a house or moved into an apartment this little guy will give the most bang for your buck.. its also bagless and fills up quick thats one flaw i guess also easy to dump lol so i guess thats not that bad!!
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: vacuum performance is good
customer_reviews.text: Carpet cleaning is very good, vacuum performance is good. as of now just used once after received
customer_reviews.author: Venkat S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small light vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice small, powerful vacuum. Good for tight places. Light and stores away easily. Lays flat to go under furniture when vacuuming. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James D Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad vacuum considering the price. It is very light and has decent suction, not great suction. The filter gets dirty quickly, but relatively easy to clean. It's overall pretty good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Extreme Quick Vac Cyclonic Bagless Upright:
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil Extreme Quick Vac Cyclonic Bagless Upright: I just used this for the first time and found that it is very light weight and easy to use while doing a better job than my previous full size heavy vacuum cleaner.. One minor complaint is that it is pretty loud...
customer_reviews.author: Porterville

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for our 5th wheel toyhauler RV. It works great in there with that small area of carpet. The sucking power is wonderful and I only have one complaint and that is it tips over easy, besides that it does just what it is suppose to do. I really did love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Pulse

customer_reviews.title: Little Devil is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous purchasing such a small vacuum, but after going over my carpets once and filling the canister multiple times, I was sold this little Devil was just what I needed. Small enough to move a round and get the tight spaces!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is light, deep clean, the carpet is very well and its price is convenient
customer_reviews.author: Maria Julia Mach

customer_reviews.title: Good size and value
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good value for the money. It is lightweight and has a reasonable amount of suction. I wouldn't say it was fantastic, but it does a good job for smaller jobs, especially on a carpet. I would buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight vacuum that would pick up cat hair and this one does the job! I didn't realize how much hair my old vacuum left behind until I got this one--it's amazing. I think the brush roller has longer and stronger bristles that really pick up the dirt on carpeting. I have to empty the canister frequently and I rinse the filter often, too, but that is OK because this vacuum really does the job and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Luckygirl3005

customer_reviews.title: A bit disconcerting to see how much it looks like a "toy"
customer_reviews.text: A bit disconcerting to see how much it looks like a "toy". I use it mostly on hard floors and one area rug...it does have good suction. Wish the hose was longer though. All in all for the price, it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's not Dynamite II but maybe Dynamite One
customer_reviews.text: it didn't show "Dynamite II" on the factory box, and I saw real Dynamite II at Walmart, the vacuum is slightly different. however the one I got works fine, but still have feeling of I didn't get what I choose
customer_reviews.author: Point

customer_reviews.title: This vac does not have very much suction power. ...
customer_reviews.text: This vac does not have very much suction power. I bought a cheaper model a couple of years ago and it was much stronger until it quit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awful on hardwood, almost as bad on carpets
customer_reviews.text: From the minute we took it out of the box, it has never worked well on hardwood floors, all it does is blow dust around. It works a little better on carpets so if you are just buying this vacuum for carpets, I would give it three stars. The main reason for the poor review is because the vacuum is advertised as a hardwood/carpet vacuum, and it is 100% not suitable for hardwood. Save your money, pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dux82

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty cheap and doesn't pick up as much as i was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Mytgurl1

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: entered the rating of this item in the belt review. an excellent vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I've had for about a year now with no issues. It's lightweight and powerful. The best part is that it all comes apart and you can easily clean it which is great for my home with cat hair so it will never get too clogged and go out. Great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Burns

customer_reviews.title: a great vacuum for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great vac - I ordered it, used it on my upstairs floor once, then ordered another for the downstairs rugs... is lightweight with good suction and the parts don't fall off it as with my last, more cumbersome and expensive vacuum, which lost suction power fairly quickly. Heats up, though, 10 min after use, but, as I wrote - for the price, it's not going to do magic... a great find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M.Blake

customer_reviews.title: crappy... but u get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: dirt jams in hoses and doesn't always pick up smaller pieces
customer_reviews.author: Linda Quinn

customer_reviews.title: so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and bought this even though I wasn't too sure. Turns out I had to use it like crazy right away: my daughter ended up getting lice and any parent who's gone through this knows the amount of cleaning is insane! You have to vacuum everything!!!! This dirt devil did the job incredibly well, I am SO happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lockman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it got great reviews. It has not worked well since I got it. Various parts keep getting clogged and we are constantly emptying the hose trying to get it to work. It doesn't pick up anything or, if it does, it gets clogged. We have spent a lot of time trying to make this work. After finally giving up, I tried to return it but the window had expired after one month. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: carol matheson

customer_reviews.title: This thing really sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It's a no frills vacuum. The sucking power on it is really impressive, especially at the price. So far it seems to be made well and reliable. My only complaint is that the dust bin is quite small, but at this price I could care less. The main thing it's supposed to do, suck up dirt, it does extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum - owned for 1.5 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. I've had one for about a year and a half - still works as well as it did when new. Just purchased a second one for my sister. Make sure to clean the foam filter periodically with water and allow to air dry. Favorite feature: collapsible handle to fit in small closets/under shelving.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Easy push and empty the dirt catcher just as advertised. I would recommend to everyon who wants an easy way to keep their home clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum really does the trick if you're looking for something low budget. Suction is excellent. The hose and attachments are great for those hard to reach areas such as in between couch cushions. It does have a HEPA filter. Make sure to wash the filter occasionally and let it dry over night before putting it back in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great power for such a small unit - the filter clogs easily but it is also easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great vac
customer_reviews.text: Luv this vac except that it gets clogged up easily, otherwise no bad issues
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fine machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for more than 1 year (neglected to write review earlier). When the filter is kept clean regularly, it is 99% as good as one of those two thousand dollar wind suckers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job in my tiny Manhattan apartment... and folds down pretty small to fit in my closet. Not the best on my rug, but overall -- good for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: dmoz

customer_reviews.title: Received BROKEN unit
customer_reviews.text: Handle wouldn't lock in. Can't use the vacuum at all. Called dirt devil as requested, waiting for almost an hour on the phone to be told to return the unit,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate and go under the bed and other ...
customer_reviews.text: Total value for money!! Very easy to operate and go under the bed and other restricted spaces It is very easy to clean and rinse the filter.
customer_reviews.author: TechieDEV

customer_reviews.title: Not so good suction
customer_reviews.text: I would have expected a little more suction power from a dirt devil. The brush helps collecting things from the ground but I still would like much more suction power. Not so powerful in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Onur Dogu

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for a lot better!!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor suction, the motor makes a high pitch whine and it always smelled like it was overheating when we used it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Still works well
customer_reviews.text: I had this dirt devil for almost a year and it still pick up like it did the first day I brought it what an amazing machine Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Valintino

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Perfect for apartments.
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Good for apartments. Small and easy to keep tucked away in a closet. No bags so that's awesome.Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Plee84

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & Bagless
customer_reviews.text: light weight for easy operation perfect for going up the stairs even for us weaklings. No bags is definatly a plus and cleans just fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, the box was pretty banged up. Had some difficulty assempling and it seemed not very sturdy. Would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable handle, sucking cyclone of awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Works for our small apartment, gets the job done. the tube is a little small so it's hard to reach ceiling fans though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: it is a good starter vacuum if you do not need to do ...
customer_reviews.text: this does the job if you have a small area to clean. it does not adjust for carpet to floor. we have a high pile carpet and it is difficult to vacuum. otherwise, it is a good starter vacuum if you do not need to do much vacuuming. not for high pile carpets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chaud4

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that the canister is on the small side otherwise its an awesome machine! this would be great for a college student to vacuum their dorm rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Kia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I thought my house was clean but this vacuum became completely full twice when I used it for the first time. It has awesome power and suction....you won't believe the junk it picks up that you never would know was there.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Kesler

customer_reviews.title: One room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have one room in my house that is an addition, where the central vac does not reach. I opened the box and thought, "This looks like a toy!" Anyway the one room, an office/game room, which seemed pretty clean to me, hadn't been vaccumed for a month. The cannister was filled with dust. Very powerful. Glad I didn't blow $400 on a vacuum status symbol.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of the DD Dynamite!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! The vacuum's compact size and light weight design allow it to be easily stored, without taking up a lot of space. Powerful, well made, and easy to use. I live in a 1 bedroom apartment with carpet, and this machine gets the job done. I'm happy with the DD Dynamite and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ZachBG

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple other light-weight vacuum cleaners for light duty and this one tops them all. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works great on carpet and rugs, not so great on hardwood floors. It is very loud and the exhaust air blows out the front of the vacuum which causes dirt, etc., to blow away from you. I bought it for my hardwood floors but it really doesn't pick up very well for that. I like the onboard tools and emptying the dirt is very easy. Not sure I would buy specifically for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Clean machine

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome....while I only have two bedrooms and a hallway with carpet...it did the trick, pet hair, hair whatever and it took me a short amount of time to do it and the cleaning of the tank was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it is. Small, compact, picks up just about everything. Easy to empty which is key.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful and lightweight vaccuum cleaner for a great price. The suction is outstanding. The only negative I would say about it is that I wish it had better attachments for things like the stairs. However, if your stairs are wide enough this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nefertari

customer_reviews.title: ... the cost they work very well and do an excellent job.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost they work very well and do an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: jackeroo

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Extreme Cyclonic Quick Vac Bagless Upright Vacuum, UD20010 - Corded
product_meta.description: The new Dirt Devil Extreme Quick Vac Cyclonic Bagless Upright Vacuum has all the features of a full size vacuum, but with a lightweight and compact design. The clean release dirt cup has a bottom empty design so you don't touch the dirt or dirty filter when cleaning out your vacuum. Also featuring an automatic height adjustment so it can easily transition from carpets to hard floors. The telescopic handle allows for ease of use as well as compact storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars634 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
